effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.the_teal_mask: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Inflicts regular damage. User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target. Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil. Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target to inflict damage. This also damages the user quite a lot and may leave the target with a burn.
